selected_skills.name: extract_rectangle_dimensions_from_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the length and width of the rectangle from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to obtain the dimensions of the rectangle from the provided image data.

selected_skills.name: calculate_rectangle_perimeter
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the perimeter of a rectangle using its length and width.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compute the perimeter by applying the formula 2 * (length + width).
